name: Aaron Allen
summary: Senior Mobile Software Engineer with 9+ years of experience designing, developing, and deploying high-performance iOS and Android applications. Strong expertise in React Native and native mobile development concepts, with hands-on experience integrating mobile apps with scalable backend services using Node.js, FastAPI, and modern APIs. Proven ability to deliver secure, responsive, and reliable mobile solutions with a focus on performance optimization, offline-first architectures, and robust testing strategies. Experienced in CI/CD automation for mobile pipelines, Agile development, and mentoring engineers to deliver production-grade mobile applications in fast-paced environments.

experience.title: Sr. Software Engineer
bullets: Engineered cross-platform mobile applications using React Native, delivering consistent user experiences across iOS and Android devices.
Developed and integrated mobile features such as offline data storage, background synchronization, and secure authentication flows, improving usability in low-connectivity environments.
Designed and consumed RESTful and GraphQL APIs from mobile clients, collaborating closely with backend teams to ensure efficient data transfer and scalability.
Optimized mobile application performance through asynchronous processing, state management optimization, and API response tuning, resulting in faster load times and smoother UI interactions.
Implemented unit, integration, and end-to-end testing for mobile flows using Jest, React Testing Library, and Cypress, reducing production regressions.
Automated mobile CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions and Azure DevOps, streamlining build, test, and release workflows for multi-environment deployments.
Collaborated in architecture design reviews, ensuring mobile-first considerations such as battery usage, network efficiency, and platform-specific behavior.
Mentored junior engineers on mobile best practices, component architecture, and performance-aware development.

Added automated testing for mobile-related business logic and UI interactions, improving stability across device types.
Worked closely with product and design teams to translate requirements into mobile-ready features and iterative releases.

experience.title: Associate Software Engineer
